Class: SMS

SMS(defaultFrom, baseUrl, version, contentType)

Class for SMS service

Constructor

new SMS(defaultFrom, baseUrl, version, contentType)

Instantiate SMS class
Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
defaultFrom string INFO Represents a sender ID which can be alphanumeric or numeric
baseUrl string https://api.infobip.com Infobip personal base URL
version number 1 API version. The version is overridable on an individual method call level - useful if some methods are still using old version numbers.
contentType string json The type of data the API returns. Values: "json" or "xml"
Source:
  • service/SMS.js, line 29
Example
// Instantiate SMS class. Specify Sender ID and Base URL
let sms = new infobip.SMS('CompanyA', 'https://api.infobip.com');

// Return data in XML instead of JSON
let sms = new infobip.SMS('CompanyA', 'https://api.infobip.com', 1, 'xml');

authorize(auth)

Authorize API calls
Parameters:
Name Type Description
auth Auth Instance of authorization class
Source:
  • service/SMS.js, line 48

(async) getReportByMessageId(messageId, version) → {Object}

Getting a report via message ID
Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
messageId string The ID that uniquely identifies the message sent.
version number 2 The API version to use. If set to "", will use the instance version.
Source:
  • service/SMS.js, line 105
Returns:
Axios response.data
Type
Object

(async) single(to, text, from, version) → {Object}

Send single SMS. The maximum length of one message is 160 characters for the GSM7 standard or 70 characters for Unicode encoded messages.
Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
to string | Array Destination addresses must be in international format (example: 41793026727)
text string Text of the message that will be sent.
from string Represents sender ID and it can be alphanumeric or numeric. Alphanumeric sender ID length should be between 3 and 11 characters (example: CompanyName). Numeric sender ID length should be between 3 and 14 characters.
version number 2 The API version to use. If set to "", will use the instance version.
Source:
  • service/SMS.js, line 71
Returns:
Axios response.data
Type
Object
Example
// Simple text
console.log(await sms.single('41793026727', 'Test sms.'))

// Multi numbers
console.log(await sms.single(['41793026727', '41793026728'], 'Test sms.'))
